scripts.build-dev: npm run parse && node ./scripts/build-prepare.js --dev  && cd ./jekyll && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.build-prod: npm run parse && node ./scripts/build-prepare.js --prod && cd ./jekyll && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.host: npm run build-dev && http-server ./jekyll/_site -p 8080 && npm run clean
scripts.dependencies: npm install && cd jekyll && bundle install
